titles.title: Brigadier General Francis Marion Memorial Act

A bill to authorize the Marion Park Project and Committee of the Palmetto Conservation Foundation to establish a commemorative work on Federal land in the District of Columbia and its environs to honor Brigadier General Francis Marion.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

bill.summary: 5/17/2006--Introduced. Brigadier General Francis Marion Memorial Act - Authorizes the Marion Park Project and Committee of the Palmetto Conservation Foundation to jointly establish a commemorative work on federal land in the District of Columbia and its environs to honor the service of Brigadier General Francis Marion to the United States. Prohibits the use of federal funds to pay any expense of its establishment.
